channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on Wear Gallery

item.title: Privacy
item.description: This page is used to inform you our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Wear Gallery application and website. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect are used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
